title: SunshineFreedom
author: SunshineFreedom
content: I need an arbitrator for multiple deals on BitRated.comIt's multi-sig escrow.  You don't have to deposit or do anything unless we have a dispute.  Then we need a quick reply.Pay:1% no dispute2% if disputeRequirements:1) Large Social Presence or some kind of credential that you are trustworthy2) You'd have to make a BitRated.com accountContact me on Session:0570a194a8128b40a20ced31de1a76f105ed9eafa8e6ffca6065d7bc0ce71ce148
